tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE survey_data (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_question TEXT,
    respondent_name TEXT,
    response_value TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE external_dataset (
    dataset_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    dataset_name TEXT,
    dataset_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE merged_data (
    survey_id INT,
    dataset_id INT,
    survey_question TEXT,
    respondent_name TEXT,
    response_value TEXT,
    dataset_name TEXT,
    dataset_description TEXT,
    PRIMARY KEY (survey_id, dataset_id)
    )

CREATE TABLE SurveyData (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 survey_name VARCHAR(255),
 respondent_id INT,
 question_id INT,
 answer VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE ExternalData (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 source_name VARCHAR(255),
 data_type VARCHAR(50),
 data_value VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
 response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 respondent_id INT,
 question_id INT,
 answer VARCHAR(255),
 survey_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyQuestions (
 question_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 question_text VARCHAR(255),
 question_type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE SurveyAnalytics (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 survey_id INT,
 respondent_id INT,
 question_id INT,
 answer VARCHAR(255),
 external_data_id INT
)
